scene.name: m2s5
scene.onstart: highlightedbar(floor9bg,f9r3bg); set(currentfloor,'floor9bg'); set(currentroom,'f9r3bg'); set(layer[scenename].html, 'The 9th Floor > Architecture Office');

hotspot.name: h1
hotspot.onclick: set(layer[tooltip].html, 'Exterior window'); hientooltip(); set(autorotate.enabled, 'false'); hienquestion(exteriorwindow, 3, h1, 1); set(events.onmousedown,tween(layer[tooltip].alpha, 0.0, 0.25, default); set(layer[questioncon].visible, false););

hotspot.name: h9
hotspot.onclick: set(layer[tooltip].html, 'Air conditioner'); hientooltip(); set(autorotate.enabled, 'false'); hienquestion(aircondition, 2, h9, 1); set(layer[questiontext].alpha,0); set(layer[questionvideo].visible,true); layer[questionvideo].togglepause(); set(events.onmousedown,tween(layer[tooltip].alpha, 0.0, 0.25, default); set(layer[questioncon].visible, false););
